context.p: Numbers in parentheses refer to Fig. 1.

p.note: Tighten all fasteners without special torques specified to standard torques.
Tighten all hydraulic lines fitted with ORFS connections. Renew all 'O' rings where used.

step.cmd: Position transmission (1) assembly under the vehicle and attach a suitable lifting device to the eye bolts on top of transmission (1).

Carefully lift transmission (1) assembly into its mounting position and secure trunnion (2) to the frame with bolts (3), spacers (4) and locknuts (6). Tighten bolts (3) to a torque of 270 Nm (200 lbf ft).
Install washers (14) and bushes (13) on brackets (18).
Assemble clamps (9) over bushings (13) and secure in place with bolts (7) and lockwashers (8). Tighten bolts (7) to a torque of 380 Nm (280 lbf ft).
Install plates (12) (recess outwards) on brackets (18) and secure with bolts (10) and lockwashers (11).
Remove lifting device and lifting eye bolts from top of transmission (1).
Install filler hose (23) to filler tube (21) and adaptor (24) and secure with clamps (22).
Secure accumulator valve mounting bracket on transmission (1) assembly with mounting hardware removed during removal.
Secure mounting brackets for body hoist lines to the top of transmission (1) with mounting hardware removed during removal.
Connect all electrical connections and cables to transmission (1) as tagged at removal.
Connect transmission oil cooler lines to transmission (1) and oil filter lines to transmission oil filter as tagged at removal.
Connect steering pump hydraulic lines as tagged at removal and secure lines to transmission (1) with mounting hardware removed during removal.
